original_text: People from everywhere in the world will look at the servants' dead bodies for three and a half days. Those are people from every nation, from every tribe and from every language. They will not agree to bury the bodies.
korean_text: 백성들과 족속과 방언과 나라 중에서 사람들이 그 시체를 사흘 반 동안을 보며 무덤에 장사하지 못하게 하리로다

sentences.original_text: People from everywhere in the world
will look at the servants' dead bodies
for three and a half days
Those are people from every nation
from every tribe and from every language
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 족속과 모든 언어에서 온 사람들입니다

sentences.original_text: They will not agree to bury the bodies
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 시체를 묻는 것에 동의하지 않을 것입니다
